metadata.title: CVE-2019-8846 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in tvOS 13.3, iCloud for Windows 10.9, iOS 13.3 and iPadOS13.3, Safari 13.0.4, iTunes 12.10.3 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.16.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.3-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.3-1ubuntu2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
